entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations with a value of -2,023,067 is represented as a child of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities with a value of -2,175,389 in the companies extension taxonomy role 000006 - Statement - CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF CASH FLOWS (UNAUDITED). The element us-gaap:CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities and the child element us-gaap:CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations.
The properties of this us-gaap:CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations fact are:
Period :2023-01-01 to 2023-06-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 26.0.9 - uamy_10q.htm 2

property.name: label
property.value: Net cash provided (used) by operating activities
